parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The order the results are returned in. Possible values: featured_date (default), appreciations, views, comments, published_date.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Limits the search by time. Possible values: all (default), today, week, month.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Limits the search by creative field. Accepts a URL-encoded field name from the list of defined creative fields.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Limits the search by a 2-letter FIPS country code.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Limits the search by state or province name.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Limits the search by city name.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the results, always starting with 1.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Limits the search by tags. Accepts one tag name or a pipe-separated list of tag names.

parameters.name: color_hex
parameters.description: Limit results to an RGB hex value (without #)

parameters.name: color_range
parameters.description: How closely to match the requested color_hex, in color shades (default:20) [0-255]

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: Filter by creative license. Acronyms found here: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the results, always starting with 1.

info: This is the information of the API
